trans-unit.source: Contains meta-information on an individual property within the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 包含組態內的個別屬性的中繼資訊。

trans-unit.source: This type cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此類型無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The PropertyInformation object contains the meta-information of an individual property within the configuration.
trans-unit.target: PropertyInformation 物件包含的設定內的個別屬性的中繼資訊。

trans-unit.source: This object can be used when validating and changing the properties of an individual attribute.
trans-unit.target: 驗證及變更個別屬性的屬性時，可以使用這個物件。

trans-unit.source: The PropertyInformation object is derived from the associated <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: PropertyInformation 物件衍生從相關聯<xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection>物件。</xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection> object is derived from the associated <xref:System.Configuration.ElementInformation> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection>物件衍生從相關聯<xref:System.Configuration.ElementInformation>物件。</xref:System.Configuration.ElementInformation> </xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"></xref> object related to the configuration attribute.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"></xref>物件與相關的組態屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> object is used to guide how the value of an attribute can be modified.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>物件可用來引導如何修改屬性值。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object containing the default value related to a configuration attribute.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件，其中包含相關的組態屬性的預設值。

trans-unit.source: An object containing the default value of the configuration attribute.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含設定屬性的預設值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the description of the object that corresponds to a configuration attribute.
trans-unit.target: 取得對應到組態屬性之物件的描述。

trans-unit.source: The description of the configuration attribute.
trans-unit.target: 組態屬性的描述。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value specifying whether the configuration attribute is a key.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指定 設定屬性是否為索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the configuration attribute is a key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果組態屬性是索引鍵，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value specifying whether the configuration attribute is locked.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指定是否鎖定組態屬性。

trans-unit.source: The IsLocked property returns `true` when the related element is locked by the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.LockAttributes%2A> or <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.LockAllAttributesExcept%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: IsLocked 屬性會傳回`true`相關項目已遭當<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.LockAttributes%2A>或<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.LockAllAttributesExcept%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.LockAllAttributesExcept%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.LockAttributes%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"></xref> object is locked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"></xref>物件已鎖定，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value specifying whether the configuration attribute has been modified.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指定是否已修改組態屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"></xref> object has been modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"></xref>物件已經修改過，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value specifying whether the configuration attribute is required.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指定是否需要設定屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"></xref> object is required; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"></xref>物件是必要項，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the line number in the configuration file related to the configuration attribute.
trans-unit.target: 取得相關的組態屬性的組態檔中的行號。

trans-unit.source: The line number associated with the source configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 來源設定檔相關聯的行號。

trans-unit.source: Zero is returned when there is no source configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 沒有來源組態檔時，會傳回零。

trans-unit.source: A line number of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 組態檔的行號。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the object that corresponds to a configuration attribute.
trans-unit.target: 取得對應到組態屬性的物件名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 名稱<xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the source file that corresponds to a configuration attribute.
trans-unit.target: 取得對應到組態屬性的原始程式檔。

trans-unit.source: The source file of the <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 來源檔案的<xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Type> of the object that corresponds to a configuration attribute.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Type>對應到組態屬性的物件。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>的<xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"></xref>物件。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorBase"></xref> object related to the configuration attribute.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorBase"></xref>物件與相關的組態屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use the returned <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorBase> object to validate the value configuration attribute.
trans-unit.target: 使用傳回<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorBase>要驗證的值設定屬性物件。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorBase>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorBase"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorBase"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object containing the value related to a configuration attribute.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定物件，其中包含相關的組態屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: An object containing the value for the <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 物件，其中包含的值<xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyValueOrigin"></xref> object related to the configuration attribute.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyValueOrigin"></xref>物件與相關的組態屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyValueOrigin> object describes how the value of the configuration attribute was determined.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyValueOrigin>物件會描述如何設定屬性的值所決定。</xref:System.Configuration.PropertyValueOrigin>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyValueOrigin"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyValueOrigin"></xref> object.
